column4: im about to install ubuntu over vista... can someone here help me with this?

k now i have guided partitioning, help on partitioning, SCSI1 (o,o,o) (sda) - 160.0 GB ATA ST9160821AS, #1 primary 160.0 GB B K ntfs   /media/sda1, Undo changes to partitions, Finish partitioning and write changes to disk, <Go Back>
